name: Matthew Broussard
bio:
Matthew is a writer/performer born in New Jersey and raised in Louisiana. With a degree in mathematics and a career in finance, his opinionated, playful and intelligent brand of comedy has him touring at colleges around the country. Matthewâ€™s film and television credits include Adam Devine's House Party, Last Call with Carson Daly, E!'s Worst I Ever, Guy Code on MTV and the independent sports comedy Intramural.

And every Monday, you can try to solve one of his visual-play-on-words puzzles on his webcomic www.mondaypunday.com.
